amendment.description: Amendment requires that special interests outside a given district or state which are trying to impact an election in that district or state must use enhanced advertisement disclaimers to include the city and state of the ad funder's residence or principle office.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 111-514 to ensure that citizens know if special interests outside their district or state are trying to impact an election by enhancing advertisement disclaimers to include the city and state of the ad funder's residence or principle office.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murphy, Patrick amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 274 - 152 (Roll no. 389).

action.text: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Murphy, Patrick.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Murphy, Patrick.
